footer.description: Designed and coded by @ zoe roversi giusti 2024. Icons @ Freepik. Pixel avatar @ Picrewの.

home.description: Videomaker, Video Editor, Front-end developer, communication enthusiast.

about.aboutDescription:
Hello! My name is Zoe Roversi Giusti. I’m a front-end developer, videomaker and video-editor from
                    Italy.
                    I’m a jack of all trades - master of some. I’m passionate about writing, reading, communicating,
                    permaculture and all things creative.

projects.permaorto: I am currently developing an app, PermaOrto (the official name is tbd), dedicated to the delicate art of growing your own vegetables. It will allow the user to collect data about their experience & easily access information about how to grow a garden. These info will follow the insights and ethics of permaculture
projects.tradAI:
ItaliaSlowTour asked me to use ElevenLabs (an app that deals with AI and audio) to dub in German a video that was originally in Italian. I'm currently doing the same work for them but for a longer video, that has to be translated and dubbed from Italian to English.

italiaslowtour.it
projects.become:
I worked for BECOME. Augmented Life for a year, as a Junior Front-end Developer and Video Editor. I spent most of my time developing this web app, that was dedicated to online courses.

discoverbecome.com
projects.patrizio:
I made this website with Wordpress for a private customer, who needed a showcase site that could be also used as a blog. Now he can easily add pages and contents by himself, if he needs to do so.

patrizioroversi.it
projects.mietta:
A private customer asked me to make a website to show her work as a director and set designer, in order to book more projects. I used Wordpress, creating four pages and showing her how she could add others herself. The website is available in three different languages.

miettacorli.it
projects.gruppo98: I made this simple documentary for a group of poets called Gruppo '98 Poesia who needed it in order to tell their story and their methodology in an accessible way. This video is going to be part of the Women's History Archive of Centro delle Donne di Bologna.
projects.tindog:
This is a website I developed in order to practice CSS for the Web Development Bootcamp by the London App Brewery.

tindog app
projects.loSaiChe:
I was the co-host of the web-series "Lo Sai Che?" for BioVoices and PerCasoSrl. The videos are about the environmental impact of our daily habits. In them, Blady and I propose some viable options.

Watch here the whole series.
projects.ampliadora: While staying in Granada to complete the EU+ master in Gender Studies, I attended two photography courses at the Social School of Photography "La Ampliadora". We organized an exposition for father's day: «TU PAPÁ TAMBIÉN». The themes were masculinities and fatherhood. The purpose was to represent these two themes in a feminist and tender light.
projects.inViaggio:
I worked for the Italian mass media company Mediaset and PerCasoSrl at "In viaggio con mia figlia", a tv series dedicated to eco-tourism in Italy. I was the co-host, alongside my mother and tv personality Syusy Blady.

Watch the interview in which we present the tv series.
Watch the trailer.
Watch the whole series.
Watch a sneak peek of the episode on Naples (with EN subtitles).

writing.writingDescription: I write stuff that I personally like

cardSection.cardP1: I've always worked in the communication field. I'm an experienced videomaker and video editor, as well as a junior front-end developer. I speak four languages.
cardSection.cardP2: I'm a sensitive person who pays attention to details. I have a lively imagination and curiosity, which help me find creative solutions to problems.
cardSection.cardP3: I know how to work in a team. I prefer direct and kind communication and active listening.

workExperience.become: 2023-2024 Junior Front-end Developer at BECOME. Augmented Life (Milan). Full remote. I worked as a programmer and a video editor, while learning to employ tools such as AWS, React.js and Unreal Engine 5.
workExperience.freelance: 2022-2023 Freelance Videomaker and Junior Front-end Developer
workExperience.Orlando2: 2021-2022 Collaboration (as a Videomaker, Photographer, Social Media Manager, Content creator) with Ass.ne Orlando-Centro delle Donne di Bologna (Bologna)
workExperience.Orlando1: 2020-2021 Paid intership (as a Videomaker, Photographer, Social Media Manager, Content creator) at Ass.ne Orlando-Centro delle Donne di Bologna (Bologna)
workExperience.loSaiChe: 2021 Co-host of the docu-series Lo Sai Che for Biovoices and PerCaso Srl (Bologna)
workExperience.TPCmagazine: 2020-2021 Editor of Turisti per Caso Magazine for PerCaso Srl (Bologna)
workExperience.sessfem: 2020 Volunteer Facilitator for the self-managed course on female sexualities Sessfem (Bologna)
workExperience.inViaggioCon: 2018 Co-host of the docu-series In viaggio con mia figlia for Mediaset and PerCaso Srl (Bologna)
workExperience.astalli: 2017 University internship at the migrant women's shelter La Casa di Giorgia at Centro Astalli (150 hours) (Roma)
workExperience.perCaso: 2015-2018 Occasional provision of services as a Videomaker and Video Editor for PerCaso Srl (Bologna)

education.master: 2017-2019 EN-ES-ITA Erasmus +: Erasmus Mundus Master's Degree in Women's and Gender Studies. Università di Bologna and Universidad de Granada (Bologna, Granada)
education.bachelor: 2013-2017 ITA Bachelor's Degree in "History, Anthropology and Religions" - Cultural Anthropology's curriculum. Università La Sapienza (Roma)
education.highSchool: 2008-2013 ITA High School Diploma from a linguistic high school [languages learned: English, French, Spanish]. Liceo Linguistico Malpighi (Bologna)

courses.angela: Online course by Angela Yu. 65,5 hours total.

courses.beFilmaker: Filmmaking beginner and intermediate courses, gained trough a scholarship.

hobbies.hobbiesDescription: Writing short stories; Reading novels, non-fiction and graphic novels; Permaculture (taking care, observing and organizing the woods and the garden near my house); Gathering wild herbs to make ointments and liquors; Hiking; Doing archery; Gardening vegetables and taking care of fruit trees; Playing table-top games; Playing video games; Non-Violent Communication; History and Philosophies of feminist and LGBTQIA+ movements; Drawing; Playing musical instruments; Singing

contactMe.contactMeSubtitle: I’m currently available for freelance work.
contactMe.contactMeDescription: If you have a project that you want to get started, think you need my help with something or just fancy saying hey, then get in touch.
